name: The Hunt for the Red Cthulhu
name_original: The Hunt for the Red Cthulhu
description:
You're set off in the single explorer sub. Deep many league under the sea. To find this anomoly creature call the Red Cthulhu. In this vast Greeny Gameboy oceanverse.

if you enjoy it. Please help voting the game on gbjam official site! >>>http://jams.gamejolt.io/gbjam4/games/the-hunt-for-the-red-cthulhu/86098
